hits.name: Structured
hits.all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA
hits.long_description: We develop AI agents that can rapidly interpret and analyze large volumes of complex log data. Leveraging sophisticated language models, these agents efficiently identify patterns and automate workflows, thereby turning high-volume, low-density data into actionable business insights. This not only boosts efficiency, but also allows IT professionals and data analysts to concentrate on strategic tasks. We're positioned to bring transformative value to businesses in IT, cloud services, cybersecurity, data analytics, and any sector grappling with immense volumes of intricate data. Our mission is to unlock the potential of data, fueling innovation and strategic growth across industries.
hits.one_liner: Harnessing AI to convert high-volume log data into practical insights.
hits.subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

all_locations.value: San Francisco, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA

hits.name: AiSDR
hits.long_description:
AiSDR is building an AI-powered sales automation platform to allow companies automatically:
- qualify inbound leads;
- create and send-out personalized email campaigns and;
- correspond with their prospects with a goal to book a sales meeting.

Basically replacing a sales development representative (SDR) - the most entry level sales position.

Companies spend $80,000 per SDR per year (fully loaded cost). With over 600,000 SDRs in the US - they are spending $48 billion on this. We can help them reduce those costs by 90%, while growing the sales pipeline.

We are second-time YC-backed founders. We sold our first company (AXDRAFT) in 2020. We started AiSDR, because after being in sales for over 5 years as a founder I became really excited by a possibility to use generative AI to fully automate the most painful part of the sales process - prospecting.

If you have any questions about sales or prospecting, I'll be happy to help. You can reach me at yz@aisdr.com.
hits.one_liner: AI sales prospecting. Replace your SDR with AiSDR

hits.name: Sweep
hits.long_description:
Sweep is an AI assistant to automate your software chores like bug fixes and minor feature requests when you spin up a ticket so you can focus on the complex engineering problems.

To get started, install https://github.com/apps/sweep-ai. Then add the repository you want, make a quick ticket (e.g. writing tests), add the label "sweep" and watch the magic happen.

Join as an alpha tester at https://discord.gg/j8XxQmpHEF.
hits.one_liner: Github app that generates code on ticket submissions
hits.subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

long_description.value:
Sweep is an AI assistant to automate your software chores like bug fixes and minor feature requests when you spin up a ticket so you can focus on the complex engineering problems.

hits.name: Andromeda Surgical
hits.long_description: We're building autonomous robots to make surgery more consistent, error free, and efficient. Starting with a common urologic procedure that has by far the best outcomes but is not widely adopted due to technical difficulty. Longer term, we're building the "Nintendo of surgery" - an open platform that we and others can build procedures on to make them safer, better, and faster.
hits.one_liner: Autonomous robots for safer, better, faster surgery

long_description.value: We're building autonomous robots to make surgery more consistent, error free, and efficient. Starting with a common urologic procedure that has by far the best outcomes but is not widely adopted due to technical difficulty. Longer term, we're building the "Nintendo of surgery" - an open platform that we and others can build procedures on to make them safer, better, and faster.

one_liner.value: Autonomous robots for safer, better, faster surgery

hits.name: Roundtable
hits.long_description:
Our first product is a platform that simulates responses to any online survey. Surveys are an incredibly valuable tool to elicit feedback from your customers. They let you know how your users feel about products and pricing. But, surveys are expensive. Dollar-wise and time-wise. It can take months to design a good survey, and after spending tens (or hundreds) of thousands of dollars collecting data, you still have to sift through all the noise and extract the signal. User and market researchers spend month and tens (or hundreds) of thousands of dollars on surveys.

Roundtable automates survey responses in seconds and for cents.
hits.one_liner: Faster, cheaper, better surveys

long_description.value:
Our first product is a platform that simulates responses to any online survey. Surveys are an incredibly valuable tool to elicit feedback from your customers. one_liner.value: Faster, cheaper, better surveys

hits.name: Tractatus AI
hits.long_description: Tractatus AI is an end-to-end generative AI development platform enabling customers to combine their own data with top LLMs (open source & proprietary) to build production-ready generative AI features. Discover use cases, run structured experiments (e.g., prompts, configs), iterate on human feedback, and deploy to production - all in a single intuitive interface. Reach out at info@tractatus.ai to learn about how start ups and large enterprises alike are delivering real customer value with Tractatus AI.
hits.one_liner: Combine your data with top LLMs for production-grade use cases

long_description.value: Tractatus AI is an end-to-end generative AI development platform enabling customers to combine their own data with top LLMs (open source & proprietary) to build production-ready generative AI features. Reach out at info@tractatus.ai to learn about how start ups and large enterprises alike are delivering real customer value with Tractatus AI.

hits.name: Reworkd
hits.long_description:
AgentGPT allows you to configure and deploy Autonomous AI agents. Name your own custom AI and have it embark on any goal imaginable. It will attempt to reach the goal by thinking of tasks to do, executing them, and learning from the results 🚀.

We think the power of AI should be available to everyone and should be driven by community. This is why we are proudly open source!
hits.one_liner: Assemble, configure, and deploy autonomous AI Agents in your browser.

long_description.value:
AgentGPT allows you to configure and deploy Autonomous AI agents. Name your own custom AI and have it embark on any goal imaginable. It will attempt to reach the goal by thinking of tasks to do, executing them, and learning from the results 🚀.

We think the power of AI should be available to everyone and should be driven by community. This is why we are proudly open source!

one_liner.value: Assemble, configure, and deploy autonomous AI Agents in your browser.

hits.name: HockeyStack
hits.long_description:
HockeyStack is an analytics tool that collects & connects all data about a B2B SaaS company's customer journey from various sources, and allows everyone to easily visualize the data. 

This allows companies to:
- Know exactly what sources & segments drive revenue most efficiently
- Find common pathways to conversion
- Understand indicators of intent and find high-intent leads
- and fulfill any other data-related need

Tracking setup takes just a couple minutes. Creating reports takes a couple more. And as soon as you're done, you get 100% visibility into all of your marketing, sales, product engagement, customer success, and revops.
hits.one_liner: Unified analytics & attribution for B2B

long_description.value:
HockeyStack is an analytics tool that collects & connects all data about a B2B SaaS company's customer journey from various sources, and allows everyone to easily visualize the data. 

This allows companies to:
- Know exactly what sources & segments drive revenue most efficiently
- Find common pathways to conversion
- Understand indicators of intent and find high-intent leads
- and fulfill any other data-related need

Tracking setup takes just a couple minutes. Creating reports takes a couple more. And as soon as you're done, you get 100% visibility into all of your marketing, sales, product engagement, customer success, and revops.

one_liner.value: Unified analytics & attribution for B2B
